A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't even begin to form an argument on why it sucks so much. I've red the entire extended universe and I know pretty much all there is to know about Star Wars of now and past\, canon or not and this piece of crap wasn't a Star Wars. It was any space movie ever. Completely denaturizing Star Wars\, ruining every previous story foundation they built before ep viii. I used to be like a 30yrs old child on the mention of Star Wars and become very excited when talking about it. This died with me entering the movie theater. I went from huge geeky fan to \"I can't believe I feel like this but I don't give a fuck about Star Wars anymore\".
